title: 87/386/EEC: Commission Decision of 30 June 1987 approving an addendum to the programme relating to the marketing of cereals, oil seeds and seed legumes in Hesse, submitted by the Government of the Federal Republic of Germany, pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (Only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 30 June 1987
approving an addendum to the programme relating to the marketing of cereals, oil seeds and seed legumes in Hesse, submitted by the Government of the Federal Republic of Germany, pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77
(Only the German text is authentic)
(87/386/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The addendum to the programme relating to cereals, oil seeds and seed legumes in Hesse forwarded by the Government of the Federal Republic of Germany on 17 March 1987 pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 355/77, is hereby approved, with the exception of facilities that are used for investment purposes.
This Decision is addressed to the Federal Republic of Germany.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 June 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
